DOC.brief_summary: The New Moves study evaluate impact school base program inactive high school girl overweight risk overweight due low level physical activity . The primary study hypothesis girl intervention school significantly decrease percent body fat compare girl control school . Secondary research hypothesis include girl intervention condition significantly increase physical activity level improve quality dietary intake .
DOC.brief_title: New Moves - Obesity Prevention Among Adolescent Girls
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose New Moves study evaluate effectiveness school-based girl alternative regular physical education class inactive high school girl . New Moves use large-scale community randomize control study involve girl six intervention school six control school . The New Moves class include physical activity , nutritional guidance , social support within supportive , non-competitive environment . In addition program include individual counseling session . The primary research hypothesis girl intervention condition significantly decrease percent body fat compare girl control condition . Secondary research hypothesis test girl intervention condition significantly increase level physical activity improve quality dietary intake compare girl control condition . In addition range socioenvironmental , personal , behavioral variable compare across condition .
DOC.criteria: High school girl Low level physical activity define precontemplation , contemplation , preparation stage change physical activity activity level , , 30 minute per day/three day per week outside school physical education class Priority give girl body mass index ( BMI ) great equal 75th percentile age gender BMI le 25th percentile age gender
